name: The Remarkable Credit Union
what_you_do: The Remarkable Credit Union Podcast explores the intersection of marketing and impact in the credit union movement, providing insights and interviews with industry leaders.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves credit union marketers and leaders, offering them fresh insights and actionable takeaways to innovate and improve their marketing strategies.
bio: Co-hosts are certified Credit Union Development Educators (CUDEs) and have presented at numerous credit union conferences.
business_focus: The Remarkable Credit Union Podcast explores the intersection of marketing and impact in the credit union movement, providing insights and interviews with industry leaders. (credit union marketing)
